event_text: m_c is caught breaking the Warrior Code.
m_c went missing for a few days.
m_c believes they are part of a new prophecy.
m_c believes they're meant for something greater.
m_c tries to convince r_c to run away with them.
m_c is caught outside of the Clan's territory.
r_c gives m_c something to adorn their pelt as congratulations.
m_c decides to pick something to adorn their pelt as celebration.
m_c found a mysterious acc_singular growing in the frost and decided to wear it.
m_c received a present, acc_plural, from r_c and decided to keep it with them on their pelt.
m_c was given acc_plural as a congratulations, r_c watches from the side with a jealous glint in their eyes.
m_c always seems to have acc_plural stuck in their fur.
m_c finds acc_plural while out on a walk and decides to keep them.
r_c finds acc_plural while out on a walk and decides to give them to m_c.
m_c tossed a snake out of the camp before it could bite someone.
m_c misstepped and slipped from a rock, but landed on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} feet nimbly, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} clanmates commenting on the show of dexterity.
m_c wasn't looking where they were going and tripped over a small trunk, but came out of it with only their pride bruised.
m_c was trying to fluff up {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest when they saw a thorn inside of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} bedding. Another prank, but it could not fool them!
m_c gathered up the kits to tell them stories of story_list.
m_c spends the evening regaling the Clan with stories of story_list.
m_c and r_c begin a small camp snowball fight while on guard duty, eventually getting the whole Clan to join in.
m_c and r_c watch the Clan's kits play and daydream about having {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own one day.
m_c watches r_c give an elder the best piece of prey on the pile. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/feel/feels} lucky to have such a kind cat as their mate.
m_c sits still as r_c helps remove some leftover Leaf-bare fluff from the back of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} neck.
m_c listens bashfully as r_c tells the story of how {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} fell in love with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} mate to a group of starry-eyed kits.
m_c and r_c are so cuddled up and cozy in their nest they almost miss the dawn patrol.
r_c gives m_c the prettiest fallen leaf {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} can find. m_c wears it with pride.
m_c and r_c spend the evening chasing cicadas around camp. m_c keeps a trophy of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} catch on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.
It's tough working in such extreme heat. m_c and r_c spend their evening relaxing together and cooling down in the shade.
m_c calls out to some eager kits, and after they have situated themselves in front of m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/start/starts} telling the kits a thrilling story of times long past.
The older cats look fondly upon the kits who are dashing in and out of leaf piles at the edge of camp.
m_c went for a long walk this morning, deep in thought.
The world around them feels smaller lately, m_c looks out at the horizon and yearns for something unnameable.
m_c considers, as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} look out over the Clan, if perhaps this isn't where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} they belong.
